# Spider (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | Azuth, Mystra, Savras, Thoth |

**Granted Powers:** Rebuke or command spiders as an evil cleric rebukes or commands undead. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Cha modifier.

**Spider Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Spider Climb (Spell)|Spider Climb]]****:** Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings.

**2** **[[Summon Swarm (Spell)|Summon Swarm]]****:** Summons swarm of bats, rats, or spiders.

**3** **[[Phantom Steed (Spell)|Phantom Steed]]**** \*:** Magic horse appears for 1 hour/level.

**4** **[[Giant Vermin (Spell)|Giant Vermin]]****:** Turns centipedes, scorpions, or spiders into giant vermin.

**5** **[[Insect Plague (Spell)|Insect Plague]]****:** Locust swarms attack creatures.

**6 [[Spider Curse (Spell)|Spider Curse]]:** Turn humanoid subject into a drider.

**7 [[Stone Spiders (Spell)|Stone Spiders]]:** Transform pebbles into monstrous spider constructs.

**8** **[[Creeping Doom (Spell)|Creeping Doom]]****:** Swarms of centipedes attack at your command.

**9 [[Spider Shapes (Spell)|Spider Shapes]]:** Polymorph one creature/level into monstrous spider.

\*Has a vermin shape.


| **Source:** | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 280 |
|---|---|
| | Player's Guide to Faerun (WotC), pg. 91 |
